I am currently working on integration the auto-refresh plug-in into the base
resources plugin.  This will require at least one new preference setting to
allow the user to turn auto-refresh on or off. For now, I would like to also add
a preference to allow the user to specify a polling delay.

Please add the following preferences to the Workbench > Work in Progress
preference page:

ResourcesPlugin.PREF_AUTO_REFRESH (a boolean)
ResourcesPlugin.PREF_REFRESH_POLLING_DELAY (a long value in milliseconds)

We can figure out a final placement later, but I want to get something demoable
in for EclipseCon.

I have added all of the required preferences under work in progress.

However there is an ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException when you switch Auto 
Refresh on when it was currently off.

Moving back to Core to finish up

changes as recently as this morning so it's likely I've resolved it (load latest
resources and resources.win32 from HEAD).

One minor nit: the polling frequency preference doesn't specify the units
(milliseconds). I think it's probably better to ask the user to specify a value
in seconds, and then scale the value to record the preference in milliseconds
(as is done with the snapshot interval preference).
